pullrequest.title: fix for issue #22, reducing inertia across fixed joints

content.raw:
I added another test to [branch issue_22_scpeters](#!/osrf/sdformat/compare/issue_22_scpeters..issue_22_fixed_joint_inertia_reduction#diff) in 4b2ea26. It tests only simple cases of fixed joint reductions, but it has fewer magic numbers and is easier to validate. Although it has simple cases, several of them fail without the fixes to parser_urdf in this pull request.

Please consider merging these changes as well.
content.html:
I added another test to branch issue_22_scpeters in 4b2ea26. It tests only simple cases of fixed joint reductions, but it has fewer magic numbers and is easier to validate. Although it has simple cases, several of them fail without the fixes to parser_urdf in this pull request.

Please consider merging these changes as well.
